name: Bobbys Adventure
description:
Sorry the Browser Version is Invisible, I hope I will fix it.

Move with A & D Jump with the Space bar, or use the arrow keys.
Maybe its usefull to jump on Spikes XD...
Thank you to play my game!

On the title screen you can press "by Catrop", and you will get to my YT channel. 
(https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdKGskR5SXRgMppkJc8BYpw)
I uploaded  Walktrough. Have Fun!

Project for the https://itch.io/jam/wowie-jam-3 by Catrop, with a few resources by Jonas Tyroller, who made the  WowieJam: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_p_9arduPuxM8DHTGIuSOg
